item.title: Rainfall Analyser
item.description: Rainfall Analyser / Visualizer This is a coursework for my Java course at JCU. I have to implement a rainfall analyser that can read data from a csv file and output the result to another file. I also implemented a visualizer that can visualize the rainfall data in a bar chart. We had to build a GUI for this project using JavaFX. Features Read data from a csv file Visualize the rainfall data in a bar chart The GUI allows the user to select a csv file.
